===Noun===

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} ''Assistant to [[w:Government of the Han Dynasty#Excellency of Works|Excellency of Works]]''

===Usage notes===
This is the term used in the Mao Zonggang edition of the [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]]. The original term used in the [[w:Records of the Three Kingdoms|Records of the Three Kingdoms]] was [[司空倉曹掾]].
